overview: Meet David. David is a lonely child searching for their father. David is also an experiment, pushed to a breaking point by the hubris and corruption of science gone mad. David is also a being of immense power, a power eclipsed only by their innocence. David cannot understand existence beyond a few stolen moments, but could they hold the key to unravelling the great unknown mysteries of life itself? Or could David be the end of everything?
tagline: Is David a friend or foe? A saviour or destroyer? A lonely child or a demon in disguise?
title: They Called Me David
